divs: Sighting Detailsi am ridnig my bike there i stop in the middle of the road i see a objest disc like looks like a penny hovering and the it take a path it had a pink color above the sky and it was during the day i saw another closer i could see more clearly it zoomed by at the same speed not sowing down and not speeding i thought it was a jet but no smoke or fire and jets dont go that fast and i lost the sight of it when it zoomed super fast like i saw it and it went as fast as light i saw it and it zoomed and it was gone.
